name: rocky-helmet
effect: Held : When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/6 its max HP in damage.
short_effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/6 its max HP in damage.

flavor_text.sword-shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.
